name: tm04
effect: Teaches Calm Mind to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Calm Mind to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Rollout Gen I: Whirlwind)

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user switches places with a different Pokémon instantly, using telekinetic power.
